name: migratePersistentStore(_:to:options:withType:)
desc: Changes the location and, if necessary, the store type of the specified persistent store.DeprecatedUse migratePersistentStore(_:to:options:type:) instead.
declaration:
func migratePersistentStore(_ store: NSPersistentStore, 
                         to URL: URL,
